page.title: 07HARDGATE SCHOOL
page.content: I go to Hardgate school which is the school for most of the children around Hardgate and Haugh of Urr. There are forty pupils in the school altogether and two full-time teachers although we get a music and gym teacher on Tuesdays and an art teacher on Fridays. The school is placed between Hardgate and Haugh of Urr. It is 119 years old and was built in 1866. The school has three rooms, eleven large cupboards, one kitchen and a dining/gym hall. I go to school five days a week and spend about four fifths of the year there altogether. During the year we get activities like orienteering, sailing, football, netball and sometimes a trip.
